meta.title: Clean History - Kyaw Kyar
meta.description: Every vehicle at Kyaw Kyar is verified for clean ownership, no illegal modifications, and zero legal risk before listing.

hero.title: Clean History.
hero.description: Every vehicle at Kyaw Kyar is reviewed, verified, and approved before it ever reaches you.
hero.policy: Only after a car has been verified through our inspection process is it officially listed for sale at Kyaw Kyar Showroom.

verifiedDoc.title: Verified Documentation
verifiedDoc.description: Ownership and registration records are fully confirmed.

noOwnerBook.title: No Owner Book Copies
noOwnerBook.description: Copied, missing, or unverifiable ownership records are rejected before listing.

noIllegalMods.title: No Illegal Modifications
noIllegalMods.description: Undocumented engine swaps, chassis changes, or unapproved alterations are never accepted.

noLegalExposure.title: No Legal Exposure
noLegalExposure.description: Vehicles linked to disputes, loans, or registration irregularities do not proceed.

cta.title: Trust Starts With What We Reject
cta.description: We remove uncertainty long before you ever see the car.
